title: Florida Beachfront Hideaway with Spa and Two Onsite Restaurants
description: Indulge in blissful moments by the water at Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel & Spa, a serene beachfront retreat nestled on Central Florida's picturesque Treasure Coast. Savour the delights of two restaurants - enjoy ocean-fresh seafood at Cobalt or catch the sea breeze at Heatonâ€™s, both located steps from the coastline. And when you seek respite from the sun-kissed shores, let the skilled hands of specialist aestheticians at the Orchid Spa rejuvenate you for another day of exploring.
location_description: Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel and Spa
offer_address: 3500 Ocean Drive, Vero Beach, Florida 32963, United States
